formattedAddress: 19 E 71st St FL 3, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 19 E 71st St FL 3, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: Temur is at the top of his game and The Pretty Boy House is a true hidden gem. Not only is the salon beautifully designed, the experience that you have there is special and memorable. I went two days in a row! Once for a haircut and then back again to have my hair styled for a special occasion. Bonus: my hair stayed perfectly styled for the whole weekend. Highly recommend!

text.text: Temur is at the top of his game and The Pretty Boy House is a true hidden gem. Not only is the salon beautifully designed, the experience that you have there is special and memorable. I went two days in a row! Once for a haircut and then back again to have my hair styled for a special occasion. Bonus: my hair stayed perfectly styled for the whole weekend. Highly recommend!

originalText.text: The absolute best in NYC! Every appointment is so personal and bespoke to the client and in turn, you come out looking fabulous! I have been seeing Temur for almost 6 years now, and ever since he started doing my hair, it has improved dramatically. He is the best at making sure his clients hair cut and color work with their hair type and also match their lifestyle and goals. He is also the best with blowouts and styling so whenever you walk out, you know it’ll be a good hair day! There’s no one else I’d trust with my hair. Over the past year we have taken me from brunette to blonde and anyone wanting the PERFECT shade of blonde, go see Temur for his sun kissed highlights! Can’t wait for him to style my wedding hair.

originalText.text:
AWESOME! The salon is very private, clean and relaxing -  and I felt safe to be indoors during Covid.

Temur is an incredible artist and really knows how to cut hair.
I have sent so many friends and. colleagues to him and everyone loves their hairstyle.  Of course you leave Pretty Boy House looking great but also the cut works so well when. you go home and do it yourself. He makes it easy to look your best without spending so much time on it.  He just knows hair!!!

originalText.text: I first meet Temur 2 years ago at a NY city salon. I was not surprised that in a short period of time he opened his own salon. The salon takes you back in time. Elegant, sophisticated and beautiful. At the salon, Temur gives you the ultimate customer experience. Not only does he give me an amazing haircut  but also able to color and highlight my hair beautifully. I recommended several of my friends and family. They are equally as impressed. Go to Temur, you will not be disappointed!

originalText.text:
First of all, the place is gorgeous!!
Secondly, Temur is super professional and was very accommodating to my needs. I rarely like when someone else cuts my hair, but he did amazing and I’m a returning client. Highly recommend!
